name: Finding Frank
description:
Finding Frank is a short maze game that showcases what lengths of friendship we can go to. A true friend is one that is stuck to the bone with the other and one that'll never leave them in despair or worry. 

Tim was invited to a maze park by his friend Frank. He meets his butler instead. Frank's butler tells Tim that Frank is waiting for Tim eagerly at the end of the maze park. Now it is up to Tim to solve the puzzles.  There are collectibles along the way that remind Tim of Frank.
